profile.summary:
Currently pursuing a career in Software and Web-Application Development/Engineering.

Experienced in multiple Python-dependent fields such as Web Application Development, Web-Automation and Data Processing.

Demonstrably excellent communication and comprehension skills in English, good literary and communicative
ability in Hindi and native proficiency in Assamese along with high-level problem solving and more-than-adequate analytical skills.
profile.headline: Software Developer at TechVariable | FastAPI | Django | REST API

experience.description:
* Developed modules and Web Applications (backend) through REST APIs in Core Go, Core Python, FastAPI, Django, Gorilla, SQLAlchemy ORM, and Gorm ORM.
* Designed and constructed APIs to implement business logic in CRM, CRUD, and microservice modules and prototyped SQL queries for test development in PostgreSQL databases and transformed the same to equivalent Django-ORM queries.
* Collaborated with team-mates in Agile Software Development in both: weekly and daily standups.
* Debugged and modified existing codebases using Test-Based Development.
experience.title: Software Developer

experience.description:
* Developed bespoke Python scripts and applications for clients based on various disciplines such as Web scraping, Data-Management, Data-Processing, and Web Development.
* Engineered APIs in Django Rest framework to implement User-Authentication, CRUD operations, and miscellaneous business logic.
* Collaborated with clients to manage timely updates about the development and delivery of deliverables.
experience.title: Python Developer

experience.companyName: Dept. of Information Technology, Gauhati University
experience.description:
* Designed, Cleaned and Collated custom Eastern Nagari Script glyphs into glyph-set and assigned Unicode values in vector format (SVG).
* Assigned Ligature and Super/Sub-script rules using Glyph Substitution in OpenType coding and
Assigned and placed Vowel, Conjunct and Diacritic symbols using Glyph Positioning in OpenType
coding.
* Published font faces as per criteria and specifications provided by the client ( Govt. of Assam) using Fontlab as well as tested and repaired any issues in the published Font Faces.
experience.title: Opentype Font Developer

experience.description:
* Hosted and provided support for online ICT skill-development seminars via distance-conferencing software as well as designed promotional materials for upcoming seminars.
* Provided training on proper, efficient, and safe usage of ICT software systems to faculty & professionals primarily from educational institutions.
* Constructed and amended basic software design and control flow based on client input and review and developed prototype web application as per client specifications in Python and Django.
* Developed custom stand-alone scripts and modules for niche applications as per boutique client request, in Python.
experience.title: Trainee

experience.description: Summer job before starting post-graduation in 2017.
experience.title: Data-Entry Instructor
